Text: This not work on Vista, the software won't install on computer.

well, it should work on vista, and i checked it out on other forums of the issue, and it is not dreamweaver that is causing the issue.

This probably will fix that problem, as people have confirmed that it worked for them:

Start>run> regsvr32 c:\windows\system32\jscript.dll
I can't get the crack to work. Can anyone explain how to use the crack? thanks
I managed to install DM9 on one Vista machine, but not on the second one (laptop). Even I have tried what Adobe suggest regarding changing the jscript.dll,  but with no success.

Well, then, i do know then that it is a vista problem on why it will not work for some people.

As far as the crack, just replace the dreamveaver exe file in the location on where the program was installed to and replace the existing file.
Could anyone confirm that this version easy install on computers with Intel Core Duo 2 processor and Microsoft Vista?
Yes, this does work with vista of any kind, though it proved to be flaky for some, and it deffently will work with intel core duo 2
